title: Council Discussion
summary: Ideas explored but no clear winner emerged
why: Enable new workflows and reduce friction in daily tasks.
flow:
Context Decay Detector** - Automatically identifies when project documentation, README files, and setup instructions have rotted and become unusable.
Decision Archaeology Tool** - Extracts and surfaces the *why* behind code decisions, architectural choices, and abandoned experiments from commit messages, PR discussions, and issue threads.
Workflow Friction Logger** - Passively tracks where developers hit repeated manual steps, context switches, and "why isn't this automated?" moments during their actual work.
ux: isn't starting new work - it's rebuilding context after interruptions.
